Win7 system play game black screen, what can i do?I tried many ways,ask for help .plz

I've always loved this game when I had it for the PS2 as a kid, and played it through so many times because it was that kind of game. Same goes for any other platform. The way it includes simple puzzles as a break from action makes playing it feel like it's an actual game instead of a shootfest or a chore. 
I will always love this game for what it brought to my childhood.
i like the story and the game play very challenging

Half-Life as a whole is basically the reason why we are all here on Steam, and why Valve is (well, was, for some of you) regarded as one of the most innovative game companies out there. It is is a definite must-play for those who want to see what started it all for Valve and the Half-Life series.

The game that started it all! 
This game just like half life 2 is nothing short of a masterpiece the gameplay is so amazing it half the time leaves me speachless i love the feeling of the atmosphere it can go from happy to depressing in just minutes not to mention its the game that started all of the rest of the half life games!

this game most likely won't appeal much to gamers in this era. nevertheless, this game, has a special place in my heart. as a person who owns half-life ('s mods) since i was very little, every character, sound effects, textures, maps, all those things remind me of my childhood.
I mean c'mon one of valves first games, its good. And it is a most beloved game by everybody.
One of the best games ever!

el mejor juego de la historia en primera persona su historia y escenas lo mejor aun epserando la parte 3
keeps getting updated even like 16 years later
I cant belive I never played this back in the day! fantastic game for being 20 years old!!!
Nada mejor que tener uno de los juegos que solo veias en los cyber, ahora puedo mostrarle a mi hermana como eran los juegos de mi infancia.
